headline: Healthcare Workforce Management System Industry Report 2026-2035: A $4.74 Billion Market by 2030 with McKesson, Oracle, ADP, Cerner, and Workday Leading
summary: The healthcare workforce management system market is expanding rapidly, driven by digital HR adoption, AI-driven workforce planning, and cost control needs. Key opportunities include cloud-based platforms, predictive analytics, and automated tools. North America leads with major companies like Oracle and McKesson innovating solutions.
